Key Match Events: Sri Lanka defeated Pakistan by 5 wickets in the Asia Cup 2022 T20I match
Babar Azam was leading the Pakistan team, while Dasun Shanaka led Sri Lanka
Sri Lanka won the toss and chose to bowl first
Hasaranga's ace spin attack powered Lanka to win
Nissanka's superb batting helped Sri Lanka win the match
Sri Lanka lost 5 wickets, but managed to win the match by 5 wickets
